channel.title: Jail and death stages
channel.description:
i want too create a code that if someone is in a certain area, and they are not staff, or have been jailed they die. i can do the staff part with if playrights, but how can i determine if someone is in jail or not? it wouldnt be isinjail() as thats just the area where jail is? or does that determine if someone has been jailed or not?
thanks alot.

item.title: Jail and death stages
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

ok its just people are determined whether they are jailed or not by isinjail, isinjail is not if they are physichally in the jail, its if they are jailed and need too mine too get out?

Read full topic

item.title: Jail and death stages
item.dc:creator: @djspanke djspanke
item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

you need to add that bit for the area you want enclosed. like if you didn’t want non-staff in falador you would make it say all people at player rights 0 or below they die upon entering the area.

Read full topic

item.title: Jail and death stages
item.dc:creator: @oldschoolscape oldschoolscape
item.description:
@oldschoolscape wrote:

[quote=“djspanke, post:2, topic:274925”]declare isInJail.

you need to say if isInJail die else tele

same with staff but playerRights <=0[/quote]

so it is isinjail() thanks alot mate. trying too get my head around this now, ive been reading a few tutorials ect. ive already set my coords for jail which are isinjail1() and isinjail2(). does this mean that if i delcare if they are isinjail() it should work? basically i want it too kill everyone who isnt jailed or staff. for a certain area, my coords are already set in isinjail() so i dont need too add coords do i?

Read full topic

item.description:
@djspanke wrote:

declare isInJail.

you need to say if isInJail die else tele

same with staff but playerRights <=0
